line_1: SYLPHS! if at noon the Fritillary droops,
line_2: With drops nectareous hang her nodding cups;

line_1: With secret sighs the Virgin Lily droops,
line_2: And jealous Cowslips hang their tawny cups.

line_1: If He, whose Hand sustain'd them, droops;
line_2: If prest by Grief our Monarch stoops;

line_1: If He, whose Hand sustain'd them, droops:
line_2: While prest by Grief their MONARCH stoops;
